title: 9 weeks to 9 days: How autonomous drilling is transforming data center construction
description:
DEWALT and August Robotics launched an autonomous drilling robot to accelerate concrete floor preparation for data centers.

The post 9 weeks to 9 days: How autonomous drilling is transforming data center construction appeared first on The Robot Report.
